title: Manager facilitates worker council meetings without controlling agenda
description: Manager facilitates worker council meetings without controlling agenda
content:
Scenario: Manager facilitates worker council meetings without controlling agenda
    Given worker councils meet weekly for governance decisions
    And corporate model had Marcus control meeting agenda and outcomes
    When worker council convenes
    Then workers set meeting agenda, not Marcus
    And Marcus facilitates discussion to keep meeting productive
    And Marcus ensures all voices are heard but doesn't dominate discussion
    And workers make decisions through democratic process Marcus facilitates
    And workplace_elohim monitors for subtle manipulation or agenda control
